table.title: Unlicensed Features
table.searchString: index=extnet sourcetype=process "No license" | dedup host | rex max_match=0 "((MM-|Slot-|MSM-)(?<slotNum>\w+)\s+|)(?<procName>\w+)\s+((?<verNum>\d+.\d+.\d+>\d+)|Not\sStarted)\s+\d+\s+(?<status>No\slicense)\s+(?<started>Not\sStarted)" | eval fields=mvzip(procName,status) | eval fields=mvzip(fields,started) | eval fields=if(isnotnull(slotNum),mvzip(fields,slotNum),fields) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<pName>\w+),(?<pStatus>No\slicense),(?<pStart>Not\sStarted)(,(?<pSlot>\w+)|)" | table host pSlot pName pStatus pStart
